dcterms:creator: Fan Xu
Xiongfei Xu
Mingwen Wang
Maoxi Li
dcterms:description: A 11,623-triple Greater China Region (GCR) word dictionary corpus manually annotated from 30 million sentence pairs extracted from Wikipedia. The corpus includes word triples in simplified and traditional Chinese scripts.
dcterms:title: GCR Word Dictionary Corpus

dcterms:creator: Fan Xu
Xiongfei Xu
Mingwen Wang
Maoxi Li
dcterms:description: A manually annotated 12,000 sentence pairs Greater China Region (GCR) word alignment corpus derived from Wikipedia and news websites. The corpus is used for evaluating word alignment models in different Mandarin dialects.
dcterms:title: GCR Word Alignment Corpus
